name: mantrae
description: Mantrae is a self-hosted tool that helps users create and manage personal mantras for daily inspiration. It organizes affirmations into collections and presents them in a clean interface with reminders.

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Organize affirmations and mantras into themed collections for different purposes

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Schedule notifications to display mantras at specific times throughout the day

features.title: Minimal Interface
features.description: Clean, distraction-free design focuses attention on the mantra content

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Share mantra collections or backup your affirmations in standard formats

features.title: Meditation Timer
features.description: Built-in timer for meditation sessions with mantra display
